title: Distributed Task Queue
description: A high-performance distributed task queue built with Redis and Go, capable of processing millions of jobs per day with fault tolerance and horizontal scaling.

title: API Gateway
description: Custom API gateway with rate limiting, authentication, request transformation, and real-time analytics dashboard.

title: Database Migration Tool
description: Zero-downtime database migration tool supporting multiple database engines with rollback capabilities and dry-run mode.

title: Log Aggregation Service
description: Centralized logging solution with full-text search, real-time streaming, and customizable alerting based on log patterns.
